summary: This document is a Yahoo! account management record for the email address littlestjeff@yahoo.com, which is associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It shows account creation details, alternate email addresses, and Epstein's personal information including his New York address.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The Yahoo! account 'littlestjeff@yahoo.com' is registered under his name with his personal address and alternate email address.

events.title: Yahoo! account creation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein created the Yahoo! email account 'littlestjeff@yahoo.com'.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein used the Yahoo! email address 'littlestjeff@yahoo.com'.
The account was created on February 6, 2000.
An alternate communication channel listed is 'jeevacation@gmail.com'.
Epstein's address at the time was 457 Madison Avenue, New York, NY 10019.
The account username 'littlestjeff' suggests a personal or informal online identity.
